meanings.definition: Of or relating to the forehead or the front part of the head.
meanings.sent1: The sincipital area of the head is where the forehead is.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched the sincipital region of his head.
meanings.sent3: The hat was too small, so it only covered the sincipital part of his head.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were sincipital, focused on the front of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight shone directly on the sincipital area, warming her forehead.

meanings.definition: Located at or near the front of the head.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the sincipital region for any signs of injury.
meanings.sent2: The sincipital bone is crucial for protecting the front of the head.
meanings.sent3: His sincipital hair always seemed to be perfectly styled.
meanings.sent4: The sincipital view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The helmet was designed to shield the sincipital area from impact.
